• Recording rules

• Service discovery

SLI/SLO Definition

• Error budgets
• Performance targets

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Golden Signals
• Latency monitoring
• Traffic measurement
• Error rate tracking
• Saturation monitoring

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Alert Fatigue Prevention
• Meaningful alerts only
• Proper thresholds
• Alert correlation
• Noise reduction

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Runbook Automation
• Incident response procedures
• Automated remediation
• Escalation paths
• Knowledge base

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Application Monitoring

span.p:
Throughput Monitoring

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
